title: Public Records/County Administrators and City Managers
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Public Records/County Administrators and City Managers;  Providing an exemption from public records requirements for the personal identifying and location information of current county administrators, deputy county administrators, assistant county administrators, city managers, deputy city managers, and assistant city managers, including the names and personal identifying and location information of the spouses and children of current county administrators, deputy county administrators, assistant county administrators, city managers, deputy city managers, and assistant city managers; providing for future legislative review and repeal; providing for retroactive application; providing a statement of public necessity, etc.

actions.description: Referred to Community Affairs; Governmental Oversight and Accountability; Rules
On Committee agenda-- Community Affairs, 01/20/26, 1:00 pm, 37 Senate Building
